title: Pls help me for this
content:
Hello,

I am looking for a clipart or image of buisness man hanged with noose. where can i get this type of image on internet?

looking for reply........
author: artslons

comments.content: Commission an illustrator. Won’t take any longer than searching the webs. Plus, you’d get exactly what you want/need, not just some random find.
Did you need to post this [twice](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821043738/http:/typophile.com/node/54195)?

\>I am looking for a clipart or image of business man hanged with noose. where can i get this type of image on internet?

I would grab your digital camera and hang around the headquarters of major banks and other financial institutions, my guess is that you'll get the image you need within a few days.

Did you need to post this twice?

I dont know which fouram is right for it so posted it twice,

Humms to himself

Ah! ça ira, ça ira, ça ira  
es hommes d'affaires à la lanterne!  
Ah! ça ira, ça ira, ça ira  
es hommes d'affaires on les pendra!  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821043738/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")

\> I would grab your digital camera and hang around the headquarters of major banks and other financial institutions, my guess is that you’ll get the image you need within a few days.

I wanted to laugh...but really..too true.
